name: Shrak for Quake
description:
Shrak for Quake is an action-shooter game developed by Quantum Axcess. It came out on 01-01-1997. Quantum Axcess published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
Shrak for Quake is available on PC.
John Romero directed the game. It was scored by Aubrey Hodges, Dissolution of Eternity''', Jeehun Hwang and Nine Inch Nails.
